CustomField.formula: (PS_Courteous_and_Professional_num__c + PS_Had_Product_Knowledge_num__c + PS_Identified_Goals_and_Objectives_num__c + PS_Overall_Satisfied_num__c + PS_Timely_Follow_Up_num__c) / (IF(PS_Courteous_and_Professional_num__c = 0, 0, 1) + IF(PS_Had_Product_Knowledge_num__c = 0, 0, 1) + IF(PS_Identified_Goals_and_Objectives_num__c = 0, 0, 1) + IF(PS_Overall_Satisfied_num__c = 0, 0, 1) + IF(PS_Timely_Follow_Up_num__c = 0, 0, 1))
CustomField.label: PS Average Score
